| HistoryText             = When [[Gordon Keefer (Earth-616)|Ape-Man]], [[Townshend Horgan (Earth-616)|Cat-Man]] and [[Henry Hawk (Earth-616)|Bird-Man]], three former member of the [[Abner Jonas (Earth-616)|Organizer]]'s [[Ani-Men (Earth-616)|Ani-Men]], escaped from prison, they started working for the [[Phillip Sterling (Earth-616)|Exterminator]]. They managed to banish [[Matthew Murdock (Earth-616)|Daredevil]] to another dimension called the void using the Exterminator's ray gun<ref>{{cl|Daredevil #39}}</ref>, but Daredevil eventually managed to return to our dimension and defeat the group. They also fought Daredevil and [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]], who interfered with a crime spree they were engaged in{{r|Marvel Team-Up #25}}. 

The original Three eventually returned to the Ani-Men and were apparently killed, but were later replaced by a new trio apparently organized by the [[Phillip Sterling (Earth-616)|Death Stalker]]. The second group are also now deceased, the second [[Roy McVey (Earth-616)|Ape-Man]] and [[Sebastian Patane (Earth-616)|Cat-Man]] murdered by the Death Stalker, and the second [[Achille DiBacco (Earth-616)|Bird-Man]] executed some time later by the vigilante known as the [[Scourge (Delazny) (Earth-616)|Scourge]], though he has since been resurrected by the [[Parker Robbins (Earth-616)|Hood]].
